review: The fire stick was a great bargain for the $28 shipped that I paid for it on sale before Christmas from a B & M store. I bought it specifically to keep from having so many boxes cluttering the front of my tv. This sits in the back and does quite well. A Roku stick is much more expensive in my experience. Main uses for this are Netflix, WWE network, and Amazon Prime streaming. WWE Network works fine, Netflix works fine and looks good. Have not tried out the amazon prime streaming yet, but I would imagine it works better on this device than my old Roku or Sony box does. I think it's quite a good bargain and is completely hidden from view. Amazon knocked it out of the park with this little device. These are great stocking stuffers or good for any occasion, really. Would love to play with future amazon devices.
